content: white side of the arm towards the front chest- sew both parts the short side of part 1 in the center of the long side of part 2 place on the body with the long part surrounding almost all the neck sew it sew the eyes place the eyes with pins on the sides of the forehead leaving space for the embroidery embroider with one natural thread around the sides and the bottom of the eyes twice leave some black space between the eye and the forehead nose- sew the nose on the top of the snout with the yarn of the beginning of the knitting and the point of the triangle downwards with the tails of the end of the knitting embroider the mouth one thread to the left and the other to the right with perl ten embroider some little spots on the natural snout near the nose and on the hands designer mónica rodriguez translation malabrigo team
